meanings.definition: A star that is exceptionally large and bright.
meanings.sent1: The supergiant in the sky shone brightly every night.
meanings.sent2: Astronomers study the supergiant stars to learn more about the universe.
meanings.sent3: The supergiant star was so big, it could light up the entire galaxy on its own!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a supergiant, lighting up the room with its brightness.
meanings.sent5: The supergiant star outshone all the others, a true marvel of nature.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is extremely large or powerful.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler was a supergiant in the ring, towering over his opponents.
meanings.sent2: The mountain stood tall and proud, a supergiant among the hills.
meanings.sent3: The supergiant of a truck took up two parking spaces with its massive size.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, the company was a supergiant, dominating the market.
meanings.sent5: The supergiant tree in the forest cast a shadow that stretched for miles.
